== Speaking Representatives From Ubuntu LoCo Teams ==

This page provides a list of speakers from different countries who can speak about Ubuntu and related technologies at conferences. Each LoCo team should decide who are the best speakers in their team and add these speakers to this list. It is recommended that a maximum of six speakers are listed per team.
